docs.title: Knowledge Base
docs.text:
Welcome to my curated collection of research papers, ideas, and explanations in the fields of motion planning, optimization, robotics, machine learning, and more.

It's where I:

  • Document and reflect on academic papers.
  • Explore foundational and emerging topics.
  • Build explainer content for complex concepts.
  • Organize my growing personal understanding in a structured, searchable way.

Whether you're here to deepen your understanding, explore specific research areas, or follow my perspective through complex topics, I hope you find the content useful and engaging.

docs.title: Contribute or Reach Out
docs.text:
If you'd like to suggest papers, discuss an idea, or share feedback, feel free to reach out!

Happy exploring!

docs.title: Gradient Descent
docs.text: Gradient descent is a method for solving unconstrained numerical optimization problems.

docs.title: RRT
docs.text: RRT is a method for solving path planning problems.

docs.title: iLQR
docs.text: iLQR is an efficient method for solving trajectory optimization problems using gradient information.
